scripts.dev:clean: stdbuf -oL -eL pnpm -C api start:dev 2>&1 | jq -Rr 'def c(x): "\u001b["+x+"m"; def reset: c("0"); def c_status(s):(s|tonumber) as $n | (if $n>=500 then c("1;31") elif $n>=400 then c("1;33") elif $n>=300 then c("1;34") else c("1;32") end)+($n|tostring)+reset; . as $line | (try fromjson catch null) as $j | if $j != null and ($j.msg=="request completed") and ($j.req) and ($j.res) then "\($j.req.method) \($j.req.url) \(c_status($j.res.statusCode))" else $line end'
scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C api typecheck && pnpm -C admin exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm -C cashier exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm -C miniapp exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm -C merchant-portal exec tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint: pnpm -C api lint && pnpm -C admin lint && pnpm -C cashier lint && pnpm -C miniapp lint && pnpm -C merchant-portal lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm -C api lint --fix && pnpm -C admin lint --fix && pnpm -C cashier lint --fix && pnpm -C miniapp lint --fix && pnpm -C merchant-portal lint --fix
scripts.test: pnpm -C api test && pnpm -C api test:e2e
scripts.dev:all: pnpm -r --parallel --filter admin --filter merchant-portal --filter cashier --filter miniapp dev
